transcript.speaker: user
transcript.text: Hi, my last bill is unusually high. Can you check charges for account 9988776655?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I’m sorry you’re experiencing a billing issue. Please review the latest invoice in your account dashboard and, if it still doesn’t resolve the problem, contact our billing support team directly at 1‑800‑555‑1234 (24/7).

transcript.text:
I understand you’re experiencing a billing issue.  
To resolve it, please review your most recent invoice in the **Billing** section of your account dashboard. If any charges appear incorrect, you can submit a dispute directly from that page and the billing team will investigate and resolve the discrepancy.
